entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 40 km/h diminishing to 20 late this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
